label: Overview
description: View all of what SimpleAI has to offer!

label: Chat
description: Interact with the GPT large-language models.

label: Image Generation
description: Generate and edit images using the DALL-E models.

label: Speech Transcribe & Translate
description: Transcribe and translate speech from an audio file using the Whisper models.

label: Text to Speech
description: Convert text to lifelike audio using the TTS models.

label: Text Moderation
description: Determine if text contains inappropriate content using the Moderation models.

label: Extract Audio from Video
description: Extract an audio file from a video file all without uploading anything remotely.

label: Resize Image
description: Resize images without uploading them to a server.

label: Upload Image to ImgBB
description: Quickly upload images to ImgBB to get direct links.

label: OpenAI Pricing Information
description: View pricing information for all of OpenAI's offerings.

label: Manage OpenAI API
description: Get API keys and monitor your usage of the OpenAI API.

label: Manage ImgBB API
description: Get an API key for uploading images to ImgBB.
